Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey there, {PlayerName}! Come over and meet Julien. He's a cat that just can't resist the harbor life.

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every time I give him a fish and try to talk about his grand feline aspirations, he meows back at me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Julien
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meow!

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He vows to achieve peak cat greatness—catching all the critters! Isn't that right, Julien?

Dialogues.Speaker: Julien
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meow... Meow!

Options.PlotLineKey: Sounds like he's disagreeing with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No doubt about it! If he fufills his birthright, he'll have all the fish he can eat!

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Impossible... There's no doubt in my mind he aims to fulfill his birthright. He'll have all the fish he can eat!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Upon hearing the word "fish," Julien begins to meow in excitement. His true feline aspirations are suddenly clear.

Options.PlotLineKey: He only meows at you hoping for fish.
He only hangs around the harbor looking for fish.
He craves total dominion over all fish.

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Outrageous! I thought he saw something in me...

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How could that be?! It's the cat's dreams we're talking about here. It can't just be about fish!

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's some truth in that. Fish are the crown jewel of a cat's life!

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, Julien, tell me it's not true! Is it really just about the fish?

Dialogues.Speaker: Julien
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meow, meow!

Options.PlotLineKey: Go on. Give him a fish and see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good idea... But I haven't managed to catch a single one today!

Options.PlotLineKey: I've got some fish on me.
I don't have any on me either.

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, really? Would you mind giving me—Ah no, giving Julien a fish?

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see... Well, if you find any fish, would you share some with Julien?

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Julien will pay you for it! Well, I'll be the one paying, but you know...

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well? Did you catch any fish?

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, thank you, I'll give it a try right now! Oh, Julien. Come here, Julien. Come get your fishy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Julien
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meow!!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Julien happily takes the fish and devours it in seconds, leaving nothing but bones. He then rubs himself against your hand to show his gratitude.

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, did you see the way he was munching at that thing?

Options.PlotLineKey: Can't say no to a snack.
It's their crown jewel, after all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, yes! Thank you so much. You helped me realize Julien's real feline aspiration!

Dialogues.Speaker: Marco
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here. You earned these!

Dialogues.Speaker: Julien
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meow, meow!
